scripts.stack1:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.CdkExampleApp " --require-approval never --profile stratospheric
scripts.stack1:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.CdkExampleApp " --require-approval never --profile stratospheric
scripts.stack2:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.CdkExampleApp2 " --require-approval never --profile stratospheric
scripts.stack2:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.CdkExampleApp2 " --require-approval never --profile stratospheric
